mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.phone AS "phone", a.sign_name AS "signName", a.template_code AS "templateCode", a.template_param AS "templateParam", a.request_id AS "requestId", a.code AS "code", a.message AS "message", a.biz_id AS "bizId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_sms_log( id, phone, sign_name, template_code, template_param, request_id, code, message, biz_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{phone}, #{signName}, #{templateCode}, #{templateParam}, #{requestId}, #{code}, #{message}, #{bizId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_sms_log SET phone = #{phone}, sign_name = #{signName}, template_code = #{templateCode}, template_param = #{templateParam}, request_id = #{requestId}, code = #{code}, message = #{message}, biz_id = #{bizId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
